_sText:
This map was broken by the update and has now been fixed. On the first release, the system did not work, but it is fixed (info further down in this description)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map by razEr

Credit room by Billy : )

- This map is old!!

- 5 levels and one bonus.

- If you end the bonus the end room will open a hole in the floor and a new button. This grants you 20 points.

- This map has no jail, it has a point system, which grants you points depending on how far you get. (Level 3 - 3 points etc.)

- If you finish the map you will be granted 10 points, and a button that ends the round.

- The timer is set to 5 minutes, if that runs out, you will be granted points depending on your level, and slayed!

- The bonus entrance is at the end of 3. (The bonus is made by Zoomj)

- There are several secrets in this map, if you see a sprite( a glowing little thing), try walking into it, and see what happens.

- A big thanx to zoomj for his wonderful bonus, and Sangre for the awesome texture scheme.

I hope you'll enjoy playing this map, as it is now functional : ]

I hope you enjoy playing my map, and have fun ; )
